name: Adam's Polishes Premium Foam Cannon - Soap Sprayer for Car Wash | Sprayer Cannister for Pressure Washer 1/4" Quick Disconnect
short_description: ✅ MASTER YOUR DETAILING GAME with a pressure wash foam cannon that's packed with industry-leading features. Our Foam Lance comes with dual adjustable spray fans, brass and stainless steel fittings, and a foaming nozzle that fits all types of bottles. ✅ A MUST-HAVE FOR ANY DETAILING ENTHUSIAST, the Foam Lance can speed up your cleaning routine while reducing the risk of damaging delicate surfaces. The layers of foam created by our cannon provide lubrication and protection for your car's paint, wheels, and trim.

✅ THE ULTIMATE FOAMING EXPERIENCE - Our Foam Cannon holds over 32oz of liquid, add Adam's Mega Foam to the mix and create a thick layer of foam that blankets your car! OR attach Adam's 16oz bottles directly for maximum convenience.

✅ PRESSURE WASHING MADE EASY - With our Foam Cannon, you can make car cleaning a breeze. The pressurized water and soap mixture creates a thick layer of foam that clings to your car's surface, making it easy to remove dirt and grime. Use it for other household tasks like cleaning walkways, windows, and siding too!

✅ 110% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - At Adam's, we're committed to providing the best car cleaning supplies and accessories on the market. If you're not satisfied with our Foam Cannon or any of our other products, let us know and we'll make it right! The Premium Foam Cannon requires a pressure washer for use.

product_description: Transform your wash into a foamy detailing experience with Honeydew Snow Foam Car Wash Soap (CWS_110). This high-foaming car shampoo blankets vehicles in thick, clinging suds that loosen dirt and grime while delivering a safe, scratch-free clean. Engineered with advanced foaming technology, Honeydew Snow Foam cannon soap produces rich, lubricating bubbles that encapsulate embedded dirt and lift them gently from the surface. The slick suds help prevent swirl marks and scratches, making every wash safer for your paintwork. Use it in a Chemical Guys foam cannon, foam gun, or even with the classic two-bucket method for professional-quality results at home. This pH-balanced car wash foam soap is gentle on waxes, sealants, and ceramic coatings, allowing you to maintain protection while thoroughly cleaning. It rinses away cleanly without streaks or residue, preserving a glossy finish wash after wash. Whether used for maintenance washes or full detailing sessions, Honeydew Snow Foam ensures consistent, reliable performance on all exterior surfaces. Perfect for cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, RVs, and boats, this automotive shampoo offers versatility across a wide range of vehicles and finishes. Beyond its cleaning power, this car foam soap enhances the experience with a refreshing honeydew scent that makes washing more enjoyable. For those who want to protect their investment while enjoying a fun and effective wash, Honeydew Snow Foam Car Wash Soap delivers the ideal balance of safety, performance, and enjoyment every time. It's great for auto detailers and car enthusiasts to use during their routine maintenance to remove road grime and have a fun washing experience.

product_description: 10-Piece Arsenal Builder Car Wash Kit with Foam Gun (HOL148) delivers a complete, professional-quality wash system that connects directly to your garden hose. Designed for detailers and beginners alike, this all-in-one kit provides everything needed to clean, shine, and protect your vehicle at home. The included foam gun car wash sprayer attaches to any standard garden hose, producing thick suds that cling to surfaces just like a foam cannon. These rich, lubricating bubbles lift dirt, grime, and road film away from paintwork, reducing the risk of scratches and swirl marks during washing. It’s the ideal solution for anyone who wants the dramatic results of a foam cannon without the need for a pressure washer. This Chemical Guys car wash kit includes three 16 oz bottles of top-rated car care products, carefully selected to cover every stage of the detailing process. From high-foaming car wash soap to waxes, dressings, and wheel cleaners, each formula is pH-balanced and safe for use on paint, glass, chrome, plastic, and trim. A heavy-duty bucket with grit guard, microfiber wash mitt, drying towel, and applicators are also included to ensure a scratch-free wash and streak-free finish. Versatile and comprehensive, the Arsenal Builder Kit is perfect for cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, RVs, and more. Whether you’re maintaining a daily driver or detailing a show car, this kit provides the tools and products you need to achieve a spotless wash and long-lasting shine from start to finish. Convenient, effective, and fun to use, the 10-Piece Arsenal Builder Car Wash Kit with Foam Gun makes it easy to bring professional detailing results to your own driveway. These car cleaning kits are great for vehicle owners and car enthusiasts to use during their routine maintenance on vehicle exteriors.

The pH-balanced formula is gentle enough for regular use and safe for all exterior finishes, including paint, glass, wheels, and trim, without stripping existing wax, sealant, or ceramic coatings. Use HydroSuds Chemical Guys foam soap with a foam cannon for maximum suds, a garden hose foam gun for convenience, or the traditional two-bucket wash method for versatility. The thick foam clings to the surface, lifting dirt and grime away from the paint to reduce the risk of swirls and scratches. Ideal for cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, and boats, HydroSuds is a great addition to your car detailing kit, delivering professional results while making wash time more enjoyable with its refreshing berry scent. Whether you’re maintaining a daily driver or detailing a show car, HydroSuds car wash soap for foam cannons leaves your ride clean, glossy, and protected. This automotive cleaning product is great car enthusiasts and DIY detailers washing your car at home and for routine vehicle maintenance.
